Special Service Areas are local tax districts that fund expanded services and programs, to foster commercial and economic development, through a localized property tax. In other cities these areas are sometimes called Business Improvement Districts (BIDs). This portal contains a map of all Chicago SSAs

Fee amount waived by City Council ordinance
Fee amount customer has paid.

The amount waived plus amount paid plus any amount that may still be outstanding. This total can include various fees that are part of the permit fee, such as zoning, open space, deposit, or missed appointment.  It can also include stop work order fees, reinspection fees, and various penalty fees.
